meanings.definition: The quality or state of being supersexual.
meanings.sent1: Her supersexuality was evident in the way she carried herself with confidence and allure.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting captured the essence of supersexuality with its bold colors and sensual curves.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his superhero outfit took on a whole new level of supersexuality.
meanings.sent4: The city's nightlife had a certain supersexuality to it, drawing in people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent5: The movie star's charisma on screen exuded a magnetic supersexuality that captivated audiences.

meanings.definition: A person who experiences intense sexual desire or attraction.
meanings.sent1: As a supersexuality, she found herself constantly drawn to romantic novels and steamy movies.
meanings.sent2: The novel's protagonist was portrayed as a supersexuality, always seeking out new adventures and romantic encounters.
meanings.sent3: His friends jokingly referred to him as the group's resident supersexuality due to his love for romantic gestures.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she was known as a supersexuality, always pushing boundaries with her bold and daring style.
meanings.sent5: The detective in the mystery novel had a hidden supersexuality that added depth to his character.
